description:
Inada Tamako is a rich classmate of Yuugo whose family runs a huge industrial farm. Usually an obese girl, under the extra fat she hides a quite beautiful figure that reveals itself occasionally when she works too hard or gets herself into a quick diet. However she feels too weak when she is thinner thus it does not take much time for her to regain all the weight she had previously lost.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Inada Tamako
